title: cannot modify header information messages while upgrading from 4.5.13 to 5.0.10
body:
hi,

i reported this already in an older issue https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/4006 but have closed it with the reference to some existing bugs. after they where fixed this message are still shown so i hope its ok when i'm creating a new issue instead of reopen the older one.

### expected behaviour
no warnings should be shown during the upgrade process.

### actual behaviour
some warnings are shown during the upgrade process from oc 4.5.13 to 5.0.10 in the owncloud.log.

### steps to reproduce
1. have a running oc 4.5.13
2. delete all existing files except config.php and /data in the oc folder
3. copy the new files of oc 5.0.13 to the owncloud dir
4. started the upgrade process with opening my oc url

### server configuration
operating system: debian

web server: nginx

database: mysql

php version: 5.4.x

owncloud version: 4.5.13 to 5.0.10

### client configuration
browser: firefox 23

operating system: ubuntu

### logs
#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 4.90.14 to 5.0.17","level":2,"time":"2013-08-14t08:15:05+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:71) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#652","level":2,"time":"2013-08-14t08:15:15+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:71) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#653","level":2,"time":"2013-08-14t08:15:15+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/eventsource.php:71) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/user.php#654","level":2,"time":"2013-08-14t08:15:15+00:00"}
```
